devicefields.name: STATUS_ID
devicefields.note: Well-known value. Uniquely identifies this as a sunspec model status (122)

devicefields.name: STATUS_L
devicefields.note: Length of sunspec model status (122)

devicefields.name: STATUS_PVConn
devicefields.note: PV inverter present/available status. Enumerated value.

devicefields.name: STATUS_StorConn
devicefields.note: Storage inverter present/available status. Enumerated value.

devicefields.name: STATUS_ECPConn
devicefields.note: ECP connection status: disconnected=0  connected=1.

devicefields.name: STATUS_ActWh
devicefields.note: AC lifetime active (real) energy output.

devicefields.name: STATUS_ActVAh
devicefields.note: AC lifetime apparent energy output.

devicefields.name: STATUS_ActVArhQ1
devicefields.note: AC lifetime reactive energy output in quadrant 1.

devicefields.name: STATUS_ActVArhQ2
devicefields.note: AC lifetime reactive energy output in quadrant 2.

devicefields.name: STATUS_ActVArhQ3
devicefields.note: AC lifetime negative energy output  in quadrant 3.

devicefields.name: STATUS_ActVArhQ4
devicefields.note: AC lifetime reactive energy output  in quadrant 4.

devicefields.name: STATUS_VArAval
devicefields.note: Amount of VARs available without impacting watts output.

devicefields.name: STATUS_VArAval_SF
devicefields.note: Scale factor for available VARs.

devicefields.name: STATUS_WAval
devicefields.note: Amount of Watts available.

devicefields.name: STATUS_WAval_SF
devicefields.note: Scale factor for available Watts.

devicefields.name: STATUS_StSetLimMsk
devicefields.note: Bit Mask indicating setpoint limit(s) reached.

devicefields.name: STATUS_StActCtl
devicefields.note: Bit Mask indicating which inverter controls are currently active.

devicefields.name: STATUS_TmSrc
devicefields.note: Source of time synchronization.

devicefields.name: STATUS_Tms
devicefields.note: Seconds since 01-01-2000 00:00 UTC

devicefields.name: STATUS_RtSt
devicefields.note: Bit Mask indicating active ride-through status.

devicefields.name: STATUS_Ris
devicefields.note: Isolation resistance.

devicefields.name: STATUS_Ris_SF
devicefields.note: Scale factor for isolation resistance.
